gameRelated.name: Bole Sangong was officially launched
gameRelated.info: The board game of BoleGaming™ Bole Sangong was officially released and launch online!

gameRelated.name: Bole Golden Flower Grand Launched
gameRelated.info: Bole Golden Flower is a multiplayer poker game that is easy to use and tests the player's courage. Come and experience the charm of Bole fried golden flowers together!

gameNewsRelated.name: BoleGaming™ have been authenticated by the iTech Labs international authoritative institutes
gameNewsRelated.info: Random number generation (RNG) of BoleGaming™ has been certified by iTech Labs it's an international authority to ensure the randomness of licensing within the game, and comply with industry specifications and technical specifications.

gameNewsRelated.name: BoleGaming ™ carts appeared at Manila Airport
gameNewsRelated.info: Hundreds of airport carts from BoleGaming appeared at Manila International Airport, which caused many tourists to watch and discussion.

activitiesRelated.info: The concert [The Youth We Spent Together: Nice to Meet You] was main sponsored by BoleGaming™ has ended perfectly.

activitiesRelated.name: Sponsorship of Fish Leong’s Manila music concert
activitiesRelated.info: Well known Chinese artist Fish Leong will host a personal concert in Manila, the capital of Philippines, in October 2018, we will also show our games on the venue.

activitiesRelated.name: BoleGaming™ invited to the ICE exhibition based in London
activitiesRelated.info: Ice Totally Gaming is the biggest annual event in the industry, and there will be more than 30,000 people from over 150 countries to attend the event.

activitiesRelated.name: The ICE London exhibition has ended successfully, let’s witness the strength of BoleGaming
activitiesRelated.info: ICE Totally Gaming is the world's largest entertainment video game trade show, it has successfully ended in London in 2019.

activitiesRelated.name: BoleGaming meets you at Macau G2E ASIA
activitiesRelated.info: BoleGaming will participate in the G2E ASIA exhibition at the Venetian Macao Hotel from May 21st to 23rd, 2019.

activitiesRelated.name: BoleGaming is Well Received in G2E Asia 2019
activitiesRelated.info: BoleGaming brought mahjong and poker games to everyone at G2E Asia 2019, which was well received by industry and visitors.

activitiesRelated.name: Asia's Sexiest Magician Fay Will Perform for BoleGaming at PAGE
activitiesRelated.info: BoleGaming invited magician Fay who is known as the 'Asia's sexiest magician girl' to perform magic show at the booth on 7/12-13.

activitiesRelated.name: The Wonderful Review of BoleGaming in PAGE 2019
activitiesRelated.info: In PAGE 2019, BoleGaming revealed the latest two local Mahjong games, such as 'Hunan Mahjong' and 'Guangdong Mahjong', hoping to give players more choices and be closer to their local gameplay.
